thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com
thread.title: Scott Misher
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses USA reviewed by Scott Misher

author: Scott Misher
title: Scott Misher
text:
After calling in due to my skepticism from the website itself and the various one off reviews, I was nervous to place an order and called first to have them answer a few of my concerning questions.
Here are the facts - I placed my order on a Monday afternoon, the sunglasses (Tom Ford - mens) were shipped from Hong Kong to my house in Phildelphia, PA and they arrived 2 days later via FedEx. Your order will send you a confirmation and a tracking number. The product was 100% authentic, even cross referenced with the Tom Ford store because I hate being jipped. They came with everything they would in the store. Definitely a legitimate site and a good product.
